meanings.definition: The behavior or dress of a fop.
meanings.sent1: His foppery in wearing a bright pink suit made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent2: The man's foppery in donning a feathered hat drew attention at the party.
meanings.sent3: The foppery of the clown's oversized shoes added to his comedic act.
meanings.sent4: Her foppery in mismatched socks was a bold fashion statement.
meanings.sent5: The peacock's foppery of vibrant feathers mesmerized onlookers.

meanings.sent1: The children's foppery in believing the moon was made of cheese was endearing.
meanings.sent2: His foppery in trying to juggle watermelons led to a messy situation.
meanings.sent3: The foppery of the dog chasing its own tail never failed to amuse the family.
meanings.sent4: Ignoring the warning signs was a foppery that led to trouble.
meanings.sent5: The foppery of the cat wearing a tiny hat brought smiles to all who saw.
